This card gives the same message that if people surround you in your life are more powerful with you, then you should accept it.Become his refuge.If you do this, then your lifestyle can also change.From this card, it appears that you have a deep understanding of spirituality.You are proficient in that subject, along with that you also have more conscience and intellect.The need is that you use these internal powers and abilities at the appropriate time.You need to renounce, trust and forgiveness in you.As a result of the habits you leave, you will be able to get a lot in future.

cards.reversed_content: If there is any problem about a person, this card informs that the person can be impractical and moving.This card is best for you business business.

If you want to prove your goal, then it is very important to have financial security.If you do not do this, then the problem may arise for you.This card can be mostly useful for property and money.Whatever financial struggle you are struggling, success is indicated.

Analyzing the picture printed in this card indicates that you have no lack of enthusiasm.Your nature is such that you take any decision in a hurry without thinking.A person of this nature is highly ambitious.To fulfill ambition, you need to bring changes in yourself.For a long time, you have been thinking about the different kinds of things about the person, but you are not able to meet him.The result you expect in your work may soon come before you.You have to avoid people who believe in cheating and tantra-mantra.In the future, you will also get the help of foreign travel and also indicates that you may also be seriously ill.While moving forward, you should keep in mind that the harmful things done in the past should not be done in the present.You should always be careful at each step.This card makes the realization that your circumstances will change in future, but take careful steps for it now.

cards.reversed_content:

This card indicates that your skill is appreciated and happiness is also available from all people.This card indicates your unique success in the future.

This card indicates efficiency.Your skill and your practical view are worth appreciating.Your new friends will be made.This card indicates business, fame and acceptance for you.

cards.card_description:
This card indicates that you may inherit a property.You can get a valuable offering or gift.In your present situation, you can live happily and happily.Try to keep whatever you have at this time.The greed to receive more can cause you to lose.The feeling of your responsibilities will be awakened in you.You are informed that you do not desire to be the boss.Protect whatever wealth you have.

Analyzing the picture printed in this card indicates that you should try to be happy in whatever you have available at this time or the situation like you at this time.Till now you have been detecting your responsibilities, but in future you will realize your responsibilities and you will follow your responsibilities thoroughly.The need is that whatever wealth you have, try to keep it safe at the moment.On analyzing your personality, it seems that you come in the early charge.The card also indicates that your heart is huge and your financial condition is satisfactory.There will be such a change in your life as soon as possible, which you will also be stunned.You have efficiency, comfort, but your control is not established.Therefore, you are informed that you first control yourself.If this is possible, success in future will kiss your step.This card also indicates that you have many types of property, which is necessary for you to control and use it properly.

In this way, if you look, then your control will be established on the property you have or whatever industry is there, but you cannot share love and money.The need is that you will need additional skill to carry forward your industry.It is possible that some disruption should also be present in it You have to be alert for that.
cards.reversed_content:
It is informed by this card that whatever wealth you have earned, your money will flow like water.Uncertainty and instability will arise in your life.Therefore, do not take any decision in a hurry.Many of your opponents will stand in front of you.An incident may occur with you, which is likely to cause heavy damage.There can also be a fight with someone.
This card is owned by the ownership Haq, possession of property and control over it.You cannot share your love and money.You wish that your work continues smoothly, you will have to take a threat to that.

cards.card_content: In this card, two beggars are passing near a Dharmasthan.Light is coming out from the windows of Dharmasthan.The icy storm is going on terriblely.There is a lame among those two beggars.Looking at them, they seem that both of them are destitute and lacking.Pentacles card is generally fortunate, but it has the exception of Five of Pentacles.The message that is received from him is more esoteric and intense.It may also mean that those beggars have lost their spiritual vision Because they do not see the love and compassionate atmosphere of Dharmasthan.It may also happen that they are deception of him!
cards.card_description:
This card indicates that the present time is very harmful for you business or economic transactions.You will experience the financial problem.You will get money in business business, your financial situation will also improve, but along with it you will also have to face loss for a long time.You will not get a favorite work in your life and due to that you may suffer heavy losses.You will experience loneliness even when all your friends and friends etc. live with you.Therefore, if you do any business business or if you get an opportunity to do any work for you, then you do not leave it.

Analyzing the picture printed in this card indicates that in the present time you should not start any such new employment or new business.This time is not favorable to you in terms of wealth.Your economic situation can improve with wealth, but at the same time there is a sign of loss for you in the future.Therefore, you try to handle whatever wealth is in your hands, whatever employment you do.There are many such friends with you, companions, who currently go on with your 'yes in yes'.You should not understand that they will always be with you.In future, your situation can also be such that all companions and friends will be missed and you will experience loneliness.It is informed to you that whatever change in the circumstances, you accept that change and always try to move forward.
cards.reversed_content:
This card indicates that whatever change is coming in your situation, you should accept it.It also indicates that in the near future, fights and difficulties may increase in front of you.It will create a crisis.You can be cheated.As a result you can face grief and stressful situation.Therefore, you are informed that during that time you can face the difficulties patiently.Your old situation will disappear automatically and a new and happy situation will be revealed to you.

This card is indicative of poverty.If you go to the shelter of God, then your financial condition may improve.You should consider all subjects financially, emotional and spiritual, closely.If you will be completely inattentive, you can face heavy losses.

cards.card_content: A merchant appears in this card.He has a scales in his left hand and he is sharing money with his right hand.Two needy people are sitting near him and accepting his kindness.The businessman has six paintacles around his head.
cards.card_description:
This card indicates a change in business.Whatever business or scheme you start or whatever money you spend, your situation will improve.You can be free from your old crisis or the difficulties for you.Take care towards others.You have a good opportunity, property, wealth, you will also be able to help others.This card indicates kindness and public welfare functions.Analyzing the picture printed in the card indicates that the distressed situation for you in the past will be diagnosed in the future.Circumstances will change.

In this present time you have every type of competence.Wealth is everything.You spend it to help others and help them.This will brighten your future.The card indicates that your nature is very kind and you give more importance to the works of public welfare.Seeing your actions, many people also jealous of you.It hurts you, but you should be adamant on your decision.You should not drown in material happiness in such a way that forget your duties.Your future is bright.The abundance of wealth and all kinds of pleasures indicate.Along with that, it also indicates that there can be a time in your life that you will have to struggle in every way.Whatever you have in the present time can also end.So you should always be alert.

This card indicates that your personality is generous and a loving.Whatever you spend at this time, your future will be prosperous.Whenever you want, you will continue to get help in every way.
cards.reversed_content: This card indicates that the number of people having jealousy towards you will increase.You will experience trouble with that.You may be betrayed in the economic subject.Therefore, you should spend your money understanding.This card indicates generosity.You will get more than what you spend.In the present time, divide the prosperity you have among other people.The best thing is that whenever you wish, you will continue to get help.

cards.card_content: In this card, a young man gives a shovel to a shovel.He is inspecting his own sown crop.He is hesitant to cut his crop.Perhaps he is wondering what he has to take and what to do.This card also indicates travel.
cards.card_description:
This card is a symbol of profit and good fortune for you.The more hard work you do, now you will get good results.This is the best time to make your future stable and good.Whatever you decide right now, it will have a significant impact on your future.Whatever work you do, do it with understanding and organizing it.

Analyzing the picture printed in this card indicates that your future is bright.Whatever hard work you do in the present time, you will definitely get its results in future.Whatever decision you take at this time, it will prove to be very important for you.You are informed that whatever decision you take in the present time, whatever employment you start, think well on every aspect.There will be a time in your life when you go through a period of economic crisis.Your partner and friend will leave you.The result will be that you will suffer excessive loss.Your nature will also change due to being surrounded by financial troubles.Therefore, you are informed that you should inspect where you are at this time.Consider what you want to do in future.It is possible that due to the troubles, you do not see any such option in front of you, on which you can make progress by walking or implementing it.It is certain that your direction will definitely be transformed.When you get the option, try to take action at a rapid pace.Otherwise your difficulties will not end.If you can learn something from your past experiences, then your future will be bright.

This card indicates that your destiny is strong.Whatever hard work you have done in the past, it will definitely get its results.Whatever decision you take at this time, it will definitely have an impact on your future.Therefore, you are informed that in the present time, whatever decision you take, consult every aspect of it well.Get complete information about whatever plan you want to make in future or whatever option you want to choose.Your personality is such that most of you want to live a life of rest, but change your nature and think.If you consider the plans smoothly, then the difficulties will be reduced.
cards.reversed_content: This card reports financial difficulties.If your contact is dissolved with someone, then there is a possibility of your loss.If you try to take a loan, it will be very difficult to get it and there will be difficulty in paying it later.You will become very upset and restless in the financial subject.Therefore, take a lot of understanding.This card indicates the scheme.You decide soon.If you keep the efforts of the past, then you will be successful.

cards.card_description:
This card informs that whatever work you do, it will be more praised and you will get encouragement.This card indicates success for you in the near future.If you are in any trading or any business, if you work on commission, then a good commission is going to be available.This card is a sign of getting a new job or business opportunity.You have to keep in mind in which direction you are going.What do you want and what you will get, go ahead only after considering these things.

Analyzing the picture printed in this card indicates that you will get its fruit in the present time.Whatever decision you take at this time, it will have a significant impact on your future.You may face financial difficulties.In the past, you were related to such people who used to support you in every decision, but in the present time you have broken all those related to all of them.The result of this is that you have different types of physical difficulties.Consider what you want to do in future.Till now, you were trapped in the state of decision and indifference, but now the time has come for you to think again on your decisions.Accept whatever change is going to come in your works and schemes.Not only this, start the action on whatever decisions you take.In the present time, you are going through such a situation that somewhere there is a little benefit and the difficulties reach more than that.Therefore, it is important for you not to wait long for any action.Take decisions immediately and start proceedings.If this is possible, you will be successful in the future.

Therefore, it is important for you to make a plan for the future by getting free from the decision and indecision situation and you should start action on it as soon as possible.

This card gives information about resting.You will get enough wealth and happiness, but there will be loneliness in your life.You can get good news and physical prosperity.

cards.reversed_content: If there is any problem for a person, then this card indicates that the person is impractical.If there is absolutely flying, then by entering your life, he can make everything different.This card indicates the best comfort and ambitions for business and money.

cards.card_description:

This card warns you that you do not believe someone who betrays you or is unnatural and clever.If you are inaccessible, a new problem may arise before you.
cards.reversed_content: This card indicates that such a person can be of orderly emotions.As a result, betrayal can also occur for you.Such a person can be unnatural, clever and artificial, due to which many types of problems can arise in your personal relationship or business.This card also indicates that there may be progress in employment, business and relations in your life.

cards.card_content: In the picture printed on this card, a beautiful woman appears to be sitting on the throne.The throne is equipped by the baby and fisheries.Water is visible around the throne.The woman is looking at the cup of her imagination with a dreamy eyes.Both his hands remain like an angel.There is a lid above the cup, indicating that the queen's thoughts do not appear easily.
cards.card_description:
This card indicates the spirit of motherhood and the safe position of Vatsalya Bhava and creative access.This indicates a stable and permanent relationship.If there is any problem related to a man in your life, then this card indicates a lot of maternal, sociable and very caution for him.You can believe in such a woman blindly.If a person is protecting you, stands in front of you like a shield during the crises you face, this situation can come in your life.In your field and in business too, your relations should be good and remain sweet, this card is available from this card.

Analyzing the picture printed in the card presented indicates that you are a very emotional and generous person.In such a situation, whoever comes in front of you can become your help by looking at your kindness and generosity.This card indicates that you keep practical access in future.In such a situation, when you establish your relationship with someone, then take a decision only after consulting it well Because after making a relationship with you, someone can cheat you later.Whatever decision you make for the future, keep positive thinking about it.Take careful steps about your current situation with awareness about relations.Otherwise, such a situation may arise in front of you that such a person comes in your life and taking advantage of the relationship and betrayed you.Therefore, it is important for you that whatever person comes in contact with you, carefully establish a careful relationship with them.Otherwise it may also happen that the person you expect highly can cheat on you.So try to reach your goal by step with strong morale to achieve your goal.
cards.reversed_content:
This card indicates that a person betrays you, save yourself from it.It is possible that the person is very famous and well-known, yet he cannot be a character of faith.Can not give up any situation in the past and bad past, but in future you will be able to help you.

This card informs that the person you do not expect, the same person will prove to be helpful for you when the time comes.

cards.card_content: A beautiful young man is riding on a brilliant horse in this card.He is running his horse in a quiet rural area.He is wearing armor on his body, on which there are wings.Kavach is a symbol of imagination and spiritual aspiration.
cards.card_description:
This card indicates a person aged 21 to 30.In such a situation it is natural to have loving enthusiasm.You can find a friend to assist during your troubles in your life, which can give you positive results.He will express his feelings selflessly.Will treat you like your personal family friend.He can be authentic, disabled and believer.

If your relationship with someone has deteriorated, then such a person can help you re -establish your relations.If you will be stuck anywhere in any subject or will be upset, then that person will give you the best guidance.There has been a single environment in your life for a long time.Because of that you will experience suffering and confusion.That person can overcome you from that situation.

cards.reversed_content: This card indicates deception.For example, the jackal is hidden in the skin of the sheep or if you consider a rope as a snake in the dark, the same situation will be presented to you.If there is a problem for a person or any human being, then that kind of person grieves your feelings.This card can get you pleasant news about love, relations and business.

cards.card_content: In this card, a young man stands holding a cup in his hand.There is a river behind it, in which water waves are jumping.One of the fish appears to be coming out of the cup.That young man is looking at him.
cards.card_description:
